org.deeplearning4j.parallelism.trainer

Interface Trainer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CommunicativeTrainer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTrainer, ParameterServerTrainer, SymmetricTrainer

    public interface Trainer
extends java.lang.Runnable
    A Trainer is an individual worker used in ParallelWrapper for handling training in multi core situations.
